item.title: Elastic Elasticsearch
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Apache Log4j2 Remote Code Execution (RCE) Vulnerability - CVE-2021-44228 - ESA-2021-31 https://discuss.elastic.co/t/apache-log4j2-remote-code-execution-rce-vulnerability-cve-2021-44228-esa-2021-31/291476 Community Resources Resource Link source https://discuss.elastic.co/t/apache-log4j2-remote-code-execution-rce-vulnerability-cve-2021-44228-esa-2021-31/291476 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Information leakage vulnerability, Fixed in 7.16.1 and 6.8.21 CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-15 10:49:08 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.
